attributes.action: Allow a company, as a taxpayer and contributor to local and national revenue, to have a vote in elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Companies contribute sizeable amounts to both the local and national economy, and are separate legal persons, yet they do not have a vote and hence no say in electing governments. One member of a company's board should have the right to vote at local and national elections on behalf of the company, in accordance with its wishes

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
